message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item labeled "Tax Expense" with a value of 1143833.89 dated 2024-02-05.

This "Tax Expense" line represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period, which is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1143833.89'}}
```
